          "value": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "To enquire about your sick leave pay, do the following: "
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "1. Access your People Portal."
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "﻿2. Select "
                  },
                  {
                    "text": "Log a Case",
                    "bold": true
                  },
                  {
                    "text": ", followed by "
                  },
                  {
                    "text": "Payroll",
                    "bold": true
                  },
                  {
                    "text": ", then "
                  },
                  {
                    "text": "Payment Request",
                    "bold": true
                  },
                  {
                    "text": "."
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "﻿3. Complete the mandatory fields and then click on "
                  },
                  {
                    "text": "Submit",
                    "bold": true
                  },
                  {
                    "text": "."
                  }
                ]
              }
            ],
